arts.ttl: Atalanta vs. Lecce: chasing a first win
arts.sum: Atalanta and Lecce meet at the Stadio of Bergamo at 15:00 CEST, with both sides looking for their first victory of the season There have been 26 official meetings between the two sides in Bergamo: 15 wins for the Nerazzurri, 9 draws, and 2 victories for Lecce.
LiveScore provides picks for all 10 weekend games as Inter face Juventus.
